title: Swarmpit
note: Deploys a Swarmpit instance connected to a couchdb database.

env.name: TRAEFIK_FR_Host
env.label: Domain
env.description: Domain of the service for the reverse proxy.

title: TheDifferentWordpress
description: Wordpress setup with a MariaDB database based on Alpine Linux
note: Deploys a Wordpress instance connected to a MySQL database.

env.name: TRAEFIK_FR_Host
env.label: Domain
env.description: Domain of the service for the reverse proxy.

env.name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
env.label: Database root password
env.description: Password used by the MySQL root user.

env.name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
env.label: Database user password
env.description: WordPress's MariaDB password

env.name: WP_SITE_URL
env.label: URL of the WordPress site
env.description: URl used by the wordpress site

env.name: WP_BACKUP_URL
env.label: Link to an existing WordPress backup (link to *.tar.gz)
env.description: Link used to import WordPress backup

env.name: GINA_GIT_REPO
env.label: Link to an existing backup repository (GINAvbs)
env.description: Link used to import/export backup repository

env.name: GINA_GIT_USER
env.label: Username of a related git account (GINAvbs)
env.description: Username used to connect to backup repository

env.name: GINA_GIT_PASSWD
env.label: Password of the git account (GINAvbs)
env.description: Password used to connect to backup repository

env.name: GINA_INTERVAL
env.label: Backup interval (GINAvbs)
env.description: Time between two backups

title: TheDifferentOdoo
description: Odoo setup with a PostgreSQL database based on Alpine Linux
note: Deploys a Odoo instance connected to a MySQL database.

env.name: TRAEFIK_FR_Host
env.label: Domain
env.description: Domain of the service for the reverse proxy.

env.name: POSTGRES_ROOT_PASSWORD
env.label: Database root password
env.description: Password used by the PostgreSQL root user.

title: TheDifferentAdminer
description: Standalone Adminer setup based on Alpine Linux
note: Deploys a Adminer instance to a chosen network.

env.name: TRAEFIK_FR_Host
env.label: Domain
env.description: Domain of the service for the reverse proxy.

title: TeamSpeak
description: TeamSpeak server with a MariaDB database based on Alpine Linux
note: TeamSpeak is a full-featured proprietary VoIP software

env.name: MYSQL_HOST
env.label: Database host
env.description: Database host used by the Teamspeak server.

env.name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
env.label: Database root password
env.description: Password used by the MySQL root user.

env.name: MYSQL_DATABASE
env.label: Database name
env.description: Database name used by the Teamspeak server.

env.name: MYSQL_USER
env.label: Database user
env.description: User used by the Teamspeak server.

env.name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
env.label: Database user password
env.description: WordPress's MariaDB password

env.name: TS3SERVER_DEFAULT_VOICE_PORT
env.label: Voice Port of the Teamspeak server
env.description: Port used to transmit voice

env.name: TS3SERVER_FILETRANSFER_PORT
env.label: File Port of the Teamspeak server
env.description: Port used to transmit files

env.name: TS3SERVER_QUERY_PORT
env.label: Query Port of the Teamspeak server
env.description: Port used to transmit queries

env.name: GINA_GIT_REPO
env.label: Link to an existing backup repository (not required)
env.description: Link used to import/export backup repository

env.name: GINA_GIT_USER
env.label: Username of a related git account
env.description: Username used to connect to backup repository

env.name: GINA_GIT_PASSWD
env.label: Password of the git account
env.description: Password used to connect to backup repository

env.name: GINA_INTERVAL
env.label: Backup interval
env.description: Time between two backups
